## Type of Change

## Checklist
- [ ] Code follows style guidelines
- [ ] Self-reviewed code
- [ ] Commented complex code

- [ ] No new warnings generated
- [ ] Added tests (if applicable)
- [ ] All tests pass
- [ ] Validation scripts pass
- [ ] Version updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Version synchronized across platforms (if skill)
